messages.message: hmm, interesting, I have added dependency for this
`python-magic` relies on `libmagic` being installed on the system I think

Seeing a import `magic` error in the model-service tests as well
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C029DKPHRPY/p1674847589558199?thread_ts=1674837811.802439&cid=C029DKPHRPY
this is a different error, looking

oh, this is model service so no poetry. @Xi Cheng since you added dep to non-poetry module I think you will also need to add this to the global `requirements.python37.in (http://requirements.python37.in)`, regenerate the `requirements_py37.txt`, and rebuild the jenkins image
and install libmagic in that image as well if it isn't already
